word: Another says: \93Up to the time of Christ's death, no change had been made in the day;\94 and, \93so far as the record shows, they [the apostles] did not give any explicit command enjoining the abandonment of the seventh-day Sabbath, and its observance on the first day of the week. ["THE LORD'S DAY\94 PP. 185, 186, A $1,000 PRIZE ESSAY.]
